text: The Kid from Spain is a 1932 American comedy movie directed by Leo McCarey and starring Eddie Cantor, Lyda Roberti, Robert Young, Ruth Hall, John Miljan, Noah Beery, Sr., J. Carrol Naish, Robert Emmett O'Connor, Stanley Fields. It was distributed by United Artists. == Other websites == * * Category:1932 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Leo McCarey
title: The Kid from Spain
